title: A Monster Fish Tale
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 284 words, Level H (Grade 1), Lexile 300L, Fiction Series
description: The Monsters decide to go on a fishing trip. After catching an old boot, a rusty bucket, and some pond weeds, they're just about to give up. But suddenly, Bonk catches a fish! The other Monsters watch as the fish flops around in the grass. They begin to feel sorry for the animal, and they decide to let it go. But now what will they eat?
reviewWords: grumbles, hungry, ladybugs, pond, raspberries, tasty
phonics: Consonant Digraphs : Identify words with sh and ch digraphs
wordWork: Alphabetizing                : Place words in alphabetical order by first letter
